```{r}
load("accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
```

---

## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes2020_data |> count(sexo)
resumen
```

---

## Visualizacion

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x = sexo, y = n, fill = sexo),alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind() +
  scale_fill_ordinal()


```
